name: Robbob's Wind-Up Rampage
description:
Game made in six days for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2

Robbob the Destroyer has escaped from Brackey's HQ and is on a mission to destroy the world! Sadly, he was designed with one critical flaw - Requiring a wind-up key for energy.
Robbob must destroy all 7 continents to satisfy his prime directive. Play as Robbob Jr, an internal helper robot, and solve puzzles to wind-up Robbob so he may have enough potential energy to destroy every continent: smallest to largest! Larger puzzles will be harder; but, they will be neccessary to give Robbob enough energy to destroy the larger land masses.

Made By:
Sammy Mahmoudi, Me - Programming, Game Design, Concept, SFX
Beto Ochoa - Robbob Design, Model, Rig, and Animations
Erin Popovich - Level, Item, and BG Models and Animations
Kian Lak - Music and Victory Jingle
